info.name: DBA Backend API
info.description:
Collection covering health, auth, user, bhikku, vihara, and beneficiary endpoints for the DBA backend.

Most secured endpoints expect an `access_token` HTTP-only cookie that you obtain through the **Login** request. Execute **Auth ▸ Login** first, then replay the protected requests in the same Postman session so the cookie is reused automatically.

request.description: Registers a new user via the auth service. Ensure `ro_role_id` matches an existing role.
Authenticates using username/password. The response sets `access_token` and `refresh_token` cookies used by protected routes.
Refreshes the access token using the `refresh_token` cookie.

body.raw:
{
  "action": "CREATE",
  "payload": {
    "data": {
      "br_reqstdate": "2024-01-15",
      "br_birthpls": "Kandy",

request.description: Creates a bhikku record. `br_regn` will be auto-generated when null.
Retrieves a single bhikku by registration number. Replace `{{bhikku_regn}}` with an existing value.

body.raw:
{
  "action": "UPDATE",
  "payload": {
    "br_regn": "BH2025000027",
    "data": {
      "br_reqstdate": "2024-02-01",

request.description: Creates a vihara record. Ensure `vh_ownercd` references an existing bhikku/user as required by the database.

request.description: Updates the specified vihara. Replace `{{vihara_id}}` with the numeric identifier returned by create/list.
